title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: The number of redraws occurring when appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode should be reduced.
SR: To observe the redraws, add the following line to StyledText performPaint method: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
